item.title: The Introduction. A Fool's Guide To Writing Functional JS (Part 1)
item.description: You’re a developer going about your day writing loops and pushing and deleting stuff from arrays and what not. And then some day you think ü§î maybe I should test my code… “Shouldn’t be too hard”, you say. And then you get started, you learn the basics of unit testing and even write some tests.
